stories.text:
I am a vivid gamer, and lately I am trying to watch more twitch channels for FIFA tournaments!

Now I am reading that Sony aquired a platform called repeat.gg and I wonder: How do people keep up with the world of eSports? Are there any good news sites, blogs etc I can follow?
stories.title: Ask HN: How to get into/keep up with eSports?
Is San Francisco the Brooklyn to Silicon Valley's Unbuilt Manhattan? (2013)

stories.text: sometimes I take some short naps, 10 to 15 min afternoon. It always seems to give me a boost for the left hours. Also I usually do it when I have a problem that I don't know how I'm going to solve, but after the nap I feel like my brain is completely fresh and prepared to solve it. It's like a hidden superpower. I don't understand why people don't talk openly about more that and pretend they are always productive.
stories.title: Ask HN: Do you take short naps while working from home?
